}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :The SMILE out-of-the-box configuration sets the network name (SSID) to SMILE-xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx, where the xx's are the Wi-Fi adapter's MAC address. :The adapter is configured as an access point with a DHCP server. :eth0: DHCP, eth1: 10.0.0.16
